metadata.description: This column stores flags associated with each customer's account. The values in this column are of string data type and provide additional information about the customer's account status or features.

The date on which the customer's account was opened. It stores values in string data type, representing the date in a specific format. This column provides information about the duration of the customer's association with the organization.

Represents the country code of the customer's location. It stores values in string data type and provides information about the geographic location of each customer. This column can be used for segmentation and analysis based on customer location.
A unique identifier assigned to each customer. It stores numerical values in decimal data type with precision of 1 and scale of 0, providing a way to uniquely identify each customer in the dataset.
Email address of the customer. It stores the unique email address of each customer in string data type. This column provides a way to contact and communicate with individual customers.
The first name of an individual. It stores the given name of each customer. The values in this column are of string data type and provide a way to identify each customer by their first name.
Last name of an individual. It stores the family name of each customer. The values in this column are of string data type and provide a way to group customers based on their family name.

Stores the phone number of each customer. The values in this column are of string data type and provide a way to contact each customer. It may include country code and area code along with the phone number.
